segments.text: I mean, why should I let them meet him?
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: I mean, I bring a guy home, and within five minutes they're all over him.
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: I mean, they're like- coyotes, picking off the weak members of the herd.
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: As someone who's seen more than her fair share of bad beef, I'll tell you: that is not such a terrible thing.
segments.speaker: Paula

segments.text: I mean, they're your friends, they're just looking out after you.
segments.speaker: Paula

segments.text: I know. I just wish that once, I'd bring a guy home that they actually liked.
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Well, you do realise the odds of that happening are a little slimmer if they never get to meet the guy..
segments.speaker: Paula
